task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Fix common problems when reading CSV inputs and producing output.txt.

section.title: Program crashes with FileNotFoundError
section.p: Cause: ranking/capitals CSV paths are incorrect.
Fix: run from repo root (so relative paths work) or pass explicit paths (e.g., data/TopUni.csv).

section.title: output.txt is missing sections or labels do not match
section.p: Cause: formatting differs from the required labels, ordering, or punctuation.
Fix: compare the output against the specification and sample output, including commas/spaces and capitalization.

section.title: Average or relative score has too many decimals
section.p: Cause: values are not rounded to two decimal places.
Fix: round to two decimals for the average score and relative score, and print consistently.

section.title: Capital-name matching finds none (or too many) universities
section.p: Cause: matching strategy differs (substring vs whole-word).
Fix: document and implement a consistent rule (case-insensitive substring is common for support docs).

section.title: Unicode / special characters display incorrectly
section.p: Cause: CSV not opened with UTF-8.
Fix: open CSV files with encoding="utf8".
